We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.)&nbsp;Marketing Manager

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	Develop strategy, marketing plan including developing product positioning, developing innovative key messages and defining the detailed plans for promotional/ advertising and sales activities in the country.
	Effective execution of all the marketing activities planned through the field force in co-ordination with the Senior Management.
	Plan new product launches from estimating the market size, to our volume plans , to final launch plan and then implement the same
	Research industry trends and competitive intelligence through survey and knowledge building programs to guide positioning decisions and ensuring that the field force is kept up to date.
	Design promotional inputs and schemes for the various verticals.
	Have close liaison with field force to assess the response to promotional materials and ensure that these materials are being used optimally.
	Deploy effective KOL strategy and monitor implementation.


Digital Marketing:


	Plan and execute all web, SEO/SEM, marketing database, email, social media and display advertising campaigns
	Design, build and maintain our social media presence
	Measure and report performance of all digital marketing campaigns, and assess against goals (ROI and KPIs)
	Identify trends and insights, and optimize spend and performance based on the insights
	Brainstorm new and creative growth strategies
	Manage the design and upgrade the PPC website including producing relevant content on an ongoing basis.
	Manage external agencies /outsourced work


Education &amp; Experience


	First Degree in Business Administration/ Marketing or any related field.
	Advanced degree in Marketing is a MUST;
	Advanced degree in Branding and digital marketing/ communications would be an added advantage.
	Knowledge of B2B markets a MUST.
	Minimum of 5+ years of marketing /digital marketing experience (client side or agency)
	Previous exposure to a broad range of digital marketing channels
	Experience in planning and executing events, workshops, symposia etc.
	Essential hands on experience managing Google AdWords,
	Proven experience in managing productivity, ability to prioritize and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment.
	Affiliations to Professional bodies would be an added advantage.


Application Closing Date:&nbsp;17th July, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Resume to:&nbsp;hr@ppcng.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

&nbsp;

&nbsp;

2.)&nbsp;Special Operations Officer

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	Performance reporting and monitoring
	Compliance: Secure and enforce Quality standards
	Secure relevant certifications, professional/ corporate memberships, registration and renewals (including audits)
	Internal Customer Satisfaction: Co-ordinate performance review meeting with EC, MD, Heads of verticals and shared services + company&rsquo;s legal representative


Requirements


	Education: Bsc, Msc
	Professional Qualification Membership of relevant professional bodies &ndash; NIM, et


Key Competencies Requirements:


	IT Savy, Analytical mind
	Team Player, Ability to work under pressure &amp; able to multitask.


Application Closing Date:&nbsp;12th July, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Resume to:&nbsp;hr@ppcng.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

&nbsp;

&nbsp;

3.)&nbsp;Cost Engineer

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	Developing and maintaining cost estimates for engineering projects, including labor, materials, and equipment.
	Creating and managing project budgets, and monitoring financial performance.
	Monitoring and analyzing project costs, identifying cost variances, and taking corrective actions.
	Preparing and delivering cost reports, including variance analysis and cost forecast updates.
	Working closely with project managers within the project management office (PMO), engineers, and other stakeholders to ensure cost objectives are met.
	Identifying and implementing cost-saving measures, including value engineering and alternative materials/methods.
	Identifying and assessing potential cost risks, and developing mitigation strategies.
	Managing vendor relationships, negotiating contracts, and securing favorable pricing.
	Maintaining up-to-date knowledge of cost engineering processes, best practices, and industry standards.
	Others duties/tasks as maybe assigned by your line manager.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess a B.Sc Degree with 3 - 5 years of work experience.&nbsp;


Application Closing Date:10th July, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Resume to:&nbsp;hr@ppcng.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

	First Degree in Business Administration/ Marketing or any related field.
	Advanced degree in Marketing is a MUST;
	Advanced degree in Branding and digital marketing/ communications would be an added advantage.
	Knowledge of B2B markets a MUST.
	Minimum of 5+ years of marketing /digital marketing experience (client side or agency)
	Previous exposure to a broad range of digital marketing channels
	Experience in planning and executing events, workshops, symposia etc.
	Essential hands on experience managing Google AdWords,
	Proven experience in managing productivity, ability to prioritize and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment.
	Affiliations to Professional bodies would be an added advantage.

2.) Special Operations Officer

Job Location: Lagos

Key Competencies Requirements:

Interested and qualified candidates should send their Resume to: hr@ppcng.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

 

 

3.) Cost Engineer

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities

	Monitoring and analyzing project costs, identifying cost variances, and taking corrective actions.
	Preparing and delivering cost reports, including variance analysis and cost forecast updates.
	Working closely with project managers within the project management office (PMO), engineers, and other stakeholders to ensure cost objectives are met.
	Identifying and implementing cost-saving measures, including value engineering and alternative materials/methods.
	Identifying and assessing potential cost risks, and developing mitigation strategies.
	Managing vendor relationships, negotiating contracts, and securing favorable pricing.

  "description": "Ifeanhealth Nigeria Limited, founded in San-Francisco, California and solely focused on Africa, we are a leading multinational HealthTech company using technology to drive three (3) therapeutic areas: Orthopaedics and Musculoskeletal Solutions (Prosthetics and Orthotics), Pharmaceuticals (Woman and Child) and Tissue Restoration (Wound Healing). Our team is a diverse mix of global citizens with education and professional experiences from around the world: North America, Europe, South America, Asia and on all corners of the African continent.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.)&nbsp;Business Development Manager

Job Locations:&nbsp;Ajao - Lagos and Kano
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	We&#39;re looking for an experienced Business Development Professional with proven Business-to-Business (B2B) expertise in driving high-impact partnerships with top-tier institutions, high-net-worth individuals (HNIS), public figures and more.
	You&#39;ll need more than charm; you must understand the complexities of B2B client engagement-from navigating organizational heirarchies and winning tust to customizing pitches that align with multilayered business mandates.


Responsibilities


	Drive B2B growth: Proactively identify, approach, and convert key decision-makers across industries into long-term partners.
	Ciustomize strategy pitches: Tailor proposals and sponsorships decks to align with clientd&#39;s bisoness goals and brand repitation.
	Own the sales process: Manage the full cycle from lead generation to deal closure-navigating B2B challenges like multiple stakeholders and long decision timelines.
	Build strong relationships: Nurture trust -based partnership with senior exeutives,ensuring sustained engagement and renewals.
	Collaborate for imapct: Work with internal teams to design meaningful, measurable CSR projects in line with sponsor expectations.


You are fit if you


	Possess a Bachelor&#39;s Degree
	Have 3+ years of proven success in B2B business developments sponsorships sales, or strategic partnerships.
	Understand B2B challenges and can adjust strategy based on industry type,buyer personality,or organizational structure.
	Are confident speaking to C-level executives and institutional stakeholders.
	Are result-driven,persistent,and skilled closer-even when starting cold.
	Are passionate about social impact and aligning businesses wih community service.
	Experience working with corporate CSR teams,DFIS,philanthropic foundations,or public sector MDAS and an understanding of Nigeria&#39;s donor landscape is a plus.


What you get


	A unique opportunity to lead hig-level impact partnerships across Nigeria and beyond.
	Work in a forward- thinking, mission-driven environment.
	Competitive compensation package (base + performance-linked incentives).


Application Closing Date:&nbsp;24th July, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and portfolio&nbsp;to:&nbsp;info@ifeanhealth.com&nbsp;and CC:&nbsp;mary.ebong@ifeanhealth.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

&nbsp;

&nbsp;

2.)&nbsp;Content Creator

Job Location:&nbsp;Enugu
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	We are seeking talented content creators in our lagos and Enugu offices to develop engaging content that resonates with our audience.
	As a content creator, you&#39;ll be responsible for crafting compelling stories,Visuals, and messags that showcase our brand&#39;s personality and values.


Key Responsibilities


	Create high-quality,engaging content (blog posts,social media posts,videos,graphics)
	Develop content concepts and ideas.
	write,edit,and proofread content.
	Design and produce visual content (graphics,videos and animation).
	Conduct research to stay up-to date on industry trends.
	collaborate with the marketing team to acheive content goals.


Requirements


	0-2 years of experience in content creation.
	Strong writing,graphic design and video editing skills.
	Excellent storytelling and creative skills.
	Ability to work independently and meet deadlines.
	Strong understanding of social media platforms and content trends.
	fluency in local language is a plus (yoruba,pidgin igbo and a little bit of Hausa)


Nice to have:


	Familiarity with video editing softwares (e.g, Capcut,Adobe premiere,final cut pro).


What we offer


	Opportunity to work on exciting projects.
	Collaborative and dynamic work environments.


Application Closing Date:&nbsp;11th July, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and portfolio&nbsp;to:&nbsp;info@ifeanhealth.com&nbsp;and CC:&nbsp;mary.ebong@ifeanhealth.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

&nbsp;

&nbsp;

3.)&nbsp;Marketing Officer / Executive

Job Location:&nbsp;Zoo Road, Kano
Employment Type: Full-time

Description


	As part of our northern expansion, we are seeking a Marketing officer/Executive who understands both the language and cultural landscape of Northern Nigeria, especially Kano,and can drive grassroots engagement,institutional awareness,and regional positioning.
	This role is about more than creating buzz- it&#39;s about shaping and local perception of IfeanHealth, building community trust, Understanding the unique health narratives of the North, and elevating our brand among hospitals,NGOs, government stakeholders and the public.
	You will manage community campaigns,social impa cts events, influencer partnerships, and medical marketing - all anchored in deep cultural flency and strategic storytelling.


Key Responsibilities


	Promote IfeanHealth&#39;s products and services across Kano and neighboring northern states.
	Identify and develop relationship with key stakeholders and potential partners.
	Develop and execute effective marketing strategies and community engagement initiatives.
	Conduct regular field visits,market surveys and promotional activities.
	Represent the brand professionally in public events, campaign and outreaches.


Requirements


	Bachelor&#39;s Degree in Marketing, Mass communication, Public Health, or related fields
	1 - 3 years of proven experience in marketing or sales.
	Fluency in Hausa and English (spoken and writeen), Fulani Language is a plus- with a strong understanding of northern customs,Values and etiquettes.
	Must be familiar with the northern culture and practices.
	Excellent communication,negotiations and interpersonal skills.
	Proven success in running integrated marketing campaigns (offline + digital) and working with traditional and social media.
	Experience in healthcare marketing, NGO communications, or corporate social responsibility is a strong advantage.
	Occasional travel would be required.


Benefits


	Competitive salary and performance-based bonuses.
	Opportunitwies for career growth in a fast-expanding company.
	Friendly and supportive work environment.
	Opprtunity to join growing brand that combines technology,humanity and purpose.


Application Closing Date:&nbsp;15th July, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;info@ifeanhealth.com&nbsp;and CC:&nbsp;mary.ebong@ifeanhealth.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Job Description


	We're looking for an experienced Business Development Professional with proven Business-to-Business (B2B) expertise in driving high-impact partnerships with top-tier institutions, high-net-worth individuals (HNIS), public figures and more.
	You'll need more than charm; you must understand the complexities of B2B client engagement-from navigating organizational heirarchies and winning tust to customizing pitches that align with multilayered business mandates.


Responsibilities


	Drive B2B growth: Proactively identify, approach, and convert key decision-makers across industries into long-term partners.
	Ciustomize strategy pitches: Tailor proposals and sponsorships decks to align with clientd's bisoness goals and brand repitation.
	Own the sales process: Manage the full cycle from lead generation to deal closure-navigating B2B challenges like multiple stakeholders and long decision timelines.
	Build strong relationships: Nurture trust -based partnership with senior exeutives,ensuring sustained engagement and renewals.
	Collaborate for imapct: Work with internal teams to design meaningful, measurable CSR projects in line with sponsor expectations.


You are fit if you


	Possess a Bachelor's Degree
	Have 3+ years of proven success in B2B business developments sponsorships sales, or strategic partnerships.
	Understand B2B challenges and can adjust strategy based on industry type,buyer personality,or organizational structure.
	Are confident speaking to C-level executives and institutional stakeholders.
	Are result-driven,persistent,and skilled closer-even when starting cold.
	Are passionate about social impact and aligning businesses wih community service.
	Experience working with corporate CSR teams,DFIS,philanthropic foundations,or public sector MDAS and an understanding of Nigeria's donor landscape is a plus.


What you get


	A unique opportunity to lead hig-level impact partnerships across Nigeria and beyond.
	Work in a forward- thinking, mission-driven environment.
	Competitive compensation package (base + performance-linked incentives).


Application Closing Date: 24th July, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and portfolio to: info@ifeanhealth.com and CC: mary.ebong@ifeanhealth.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

 

 

2.) Content Creator

Job Location: Enugu
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	We are seeking talented content creators in our lagos and Enugu offices to develop engaging content that resonates with our audience.
	As a content creator, you'll be responsible for crafting compelling stories,Visuals, and messags that showcase our brand's personality and values.


Key Responsibilities


	Create high-quality,engaging content (blog posts,social media posts,videos,graphics)
	Develop content concepts and ideas.
	write,edit,and proofread content.
	Design and produce visual content (graphics,videos and animation).
	Conduct research to stay up-to date on industry trends.
	collaborate with the marketing team to acheive content goals.


Requirements


	0-2 years of experience in content creation.
	Strong writing,graphic design and video editing skills.
	Excellent storytelling and creative skills.
	Ability to work independently and meet deadlines.
	Strong understanding of social media platforms and content trends.
	fluency in local language is a plus (yoruba,pidgin igbo and a little bit of Hausa)


Nice to have:


	Familiarity with video editing softwares (e.g, Capcut,Adobe premiere,final cut pro).


What we offer


	Opportunity to work on exciting projects.
	Collaborative and dynamic work environments.


Application Closing Date: 11th July, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and portfolio to: info@ifeanhealth.com and CC: mary.ebong@ifeanhealth.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

 

 

3.) Marketing Officer / Executive

Job Location: Zoo Road, Kano
Employment Type: Full-time

Description


	As part of our northern expansion, we are seeking a Marketing officer/Executive who understands both the language and cultural landscape of Northern Nigeria, especially Kano,and can drive grassroots engagement,institutional awareness,and regional positioning.
	This role is about more than creating buzz- it's about shaping and local perception of IfeanHealth, building community trust, Understanding the unique health narratives of the North, and elevating our brand among hospitals,NGOs, government stakeholders and the public.
	You will manage community campaigns,social impa cts events, influencer partnerships, and medical marketing - all anchored in deep cultural flency and strategic storytelling.


Key Responsibilities


	Promote IfeanHealth's products and services across Kano and neighboring northern states.
	Identify and develop relationship with key stakeholders and potential partners.
	Develop and execute effective marketing strategies and community engagement initiatives.
	Conduct regular field visits,market surveys and promotional activities.
	Represent the brand professionally in public events, campaign and outreaches.


Requirements


	Bachelor's Degree in Marketing, Mass communication, Public Health, or related fields
	1 - 3 years of proven experience in marketing or sales.
	Fluency in Hausa and English (spoken and writeen), Fulani Language is a plus- with a strong understanding of northern customs,Values and etiquettes.
	Must be familiar with the northern culture and practices.
	Excellent communication,negotiations and interpersonal skills.
	Proven success in running integrated marketing campaigns (offline + digital) and working with traditional and social media.
	Experience in healthcare marketing, NGO communications, or corporate social responsibility is a strong advantage.
	Occasional travel would be required.


Benefits


	Competitive salary and performance-based bonuses.
	Opportunitwies for career growth in a fast-expanding company.
	Friendly and supportive work environment.
	Opprtunity to join growing brand that combines technology,humanity and purpose.


Application Closing Date: 15th July, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: info@ifeanhealth.com and CC: mary.ebong@ifeanhealth.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Human Resources and Admin Officer Job at NoemDek Limited




        
    

        
        NoemDek Limited is an EPC Company incorporated in Nigeria in 2012, to provide specialized services to the Oil & Gas, Power Generation, FMCGs, etc. Over the past five years, the firm and its international partners have supported clients on large infrastructure projects and after-sales services to ensure the assets are maintained effectively and a client’s operations run smoothly.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Human Resources and Admin Officer

Job Location: Ikoyi, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description:
     

            
    




	Assist in recruitment and onboarding processes
	Maintain employee records and ensure compliance with company policies and procedures
	Coordinate training and development programs for employees
	Handle day-to-day administrative tasks and office management duties
	Assist in payroll processing and benefits administration
	Support the HR Manager in various HR projects and initiatives.


Requirements


	Bachelor's Degree in Human Resources Management, Business Administration, or a related field
	Strong passion for HR and admin functions
	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
	Ability to work in a fast-paced and dynamic environment
	Proficient in Microsoft Office applications
	Strong attention to detail and organizational skills.


Note: If you are a recent college graduate looking to kickstart your career in Human Resources and Administration, we encourage you to apply for this exciting opportunity.
